reviewText: OK this dvd is mostly striptease done within the premise of a rich mansion house. The girls are pretty good looking, they feature adult XXX stars such as Victoria Paris, Patricia Kennedy, Tiffany Million, Tiana Taylor. And yes most of them have fake breasts but that still doesnt mean these girls don't know how to shake it and move before a camera. Now I like the element of tease thats why this dvd appeals to me so much and these starlets have mastered the art pretty well in the course of this dvd which is 60 minutes long. Most of these adult films stars, if not all, are retired and out of the business. I know for a fact Patricia Kennedy is a grandmother, lol if you can believe that. Having said that this dvd then becomes an iconic and memorable time piece to save and enjoy for years to come. If however you are looking for hardcore triple XXX material then I suggest you stay away from this product.  This DVD is a transfer from a VHS video that has been transfered over pretty well without any noticable damage, the audio is fine.
